resources.string:
AMRITA INSTITUTE OF MEDICAL SCIENCES

SURVEY QUESTIONAIRE

Name_______________________________

The aim of the study is to compare the diagnostic process guided by GPT (computer program) with the usual process done by the physicians. Your treatment team, including nurses and physicians, will not be exposed to the computer-generated treatment plan and will deliver the usual care.

I hereby give my voluntary consent to participate in the Study on the Use of ChatGPT Interface in Healthcare by completing the questionnaire provided.

I agree that my data will be used for research purposes only. My participation is entirely voluntary, and I have the right to withdraw from the study at any time without any consequences. My participation or non-participation will not affect my treatment in any way.

By agreeing to participate in this study, I acknowledge that I have read and understand the information provided in this consent form.
